dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2473 IH: Preserving Capital Access and Mortgage Liquidity Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clay (for himself and Mr. Neugebauer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To include credit unions as community financial institutions under the Federal Home Loan Bank Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preserving Capital Access and Mortgage Liquidity Act of 2015.

section.header: Definition of a community financial institution
section.text: Section 2(10)(A)(i) of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act (12 U.S.C. 1422(10)(A)(i)) is amended to read as follows:

subclause.text: the deposits of which are insured under the Federal Deposit Insurance Act; or
that is a Federal credit union or a State credit union (as such terms are defined, respectively, under section 101 of the Federal Credit Union Act); and
